Map Up Akure

Map up Akure is a community driven event sponsored by Eco-Innovation Hub, Akure and supported by Google. It is scheduled to hold between 8th and 10th of August 2013.

Interested participants can sign-up for the event at https://bit.ly.akuremapup

more information about map ups can be found here. https://sites.google.com/site/mapyourworldcommunity/
